This is an educational Project for the Vives University College Computer Science students.

The author is Milan Dima milan.dima@vives.be
The licence should always be Creative Commons BY 4.0.

All generated material serves a teaching purpose in a tutorial style.

Always use very basic examples and code unless otherwise instructed and explain everything well.
